name: userservice
description: This is a service to manage Users API

scripts.start: nodemon --watch src/** --ext ts,json --ignore src/**/*.spec.ts --exec ts-node --files server.ts
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src/** --ext ts,json --ignore src/**/*.spec.ts --exec ts-node --files server.ts
scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production nodemon --watch src/** --ext ts,json --ignore src/**/*.spec.ts --exec ts-node --files server.ts

author: Iosys Pvt Ltd
